divs: Sighting Detailsi was near the chinese restaurant "la muraglia" in ivrea, italy, a bright yellow ball in the sky, his flight path was regular but sometimes change his speed, after 3 minutes the light desappear, in this zone in frequently see this phenomenon for the people especially in turin is the routine, the object was at 3000 ft from land and mantain the speed like a charter with sometimes any accelerated, i'm sorry for my english,
